Geographic origin: Chevy Chase, Montgomery County, Maryland, United States
Notes on original: Frost injury x6; New spur frozen Mar 29 at 25 degrees Fahrenheit when leaves were 3x1/2 inches. This condition seems general. Taken as of 10 am Mar 30. After a second freeze of about same temperature but with less wind. Evening of the 28 there was sleet followed by low temperature all night and considerable wind. Ice at ground level 1/3 inch thick and ground well frozen. Peticles, mid-ribs, etc. of leaves more or less blackened. Several very backward limbs showing white but essential parts thoroughly blackened.
Name: Pyrus communis: Kieffer
